Game.Name: Shanghai
Game.Desc: A solitaire game of deep meditation, with some very important people. Take as long as you like; relaxation is the goal.

Game.Name: DodgeBall
Game.Desc: Fast-paced and fun! Catch the green balls with your mouse, while avoiding the red balls. No clicking!

Game.Name: Ballooney
Game.Desc: Pop balloons if two or more of the same color touch. Take your time and pop lots of balloons. Clearing the board takes you to new levels.
